results.title: The Sullivans
results.brief_description: The Sullivans told the story of an average middle-class Melbourne family and the effect World War II had on their lives.

constellations_other.name: 1970s TV
constellations_other.description: The 1970s was a thrilling time in Australian television as productions expanded in scale, scope, and ambition.

results.description: The Sullivans is an Australian drama television series produced by Crawford Productions which ran on the Nine Network from 1976 until 1983. The series told the story of an average middle-class Melbourne family and the effect World War II had on their lives. It was a consistent ratings success in Australia, and also became popular in the United Kingdom, Ireland, Netherlands, Gibraltar and New Zealand.
description_for_label: The Sullivans is an Australian drama television series produced by Crawford Productions which ran on the Nine Network from 1976 until 1983. The series told the story of an average middle-class Melbourne family and the effect World War II had on their lives. It was a consistent ratings success in Australia, and also became popular in the United Kingdom, Ireland, Netherlands, Gibraltar and New Zealand.

results.title: The Staircase
results.brief_description: Academy Award-winning documentary filmmaker, Jean-Xavier de Lestrade, presents a gripping courtroom thriller, offering a rare and revealing inside look at a high-profile murder trial. In 2001, author Michael Peterson was arraigned for the murder of his wife Kathleen, whose body was discovered lying in a pool of blood on the stairway of their home. Granted unusual access to Peterson’s lawyers, home and immediate family, de Lestrade’s cameras capture the defense team as it considers its strategic options. The series is an engrossing look at contemporary American justice that features more twists than a legal bestseller.

results.title: The Square
results.creator_credit: The Othrs, Roast Beef Productions, Worldview Entertainment, Noujaim Films, Jehane Noujaim, Maxyne Franklin and Karim Amer
results.headline_credit: Egypt, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2013
results.brief_description: The Square looks at the hard realities faced day-to-day by people working to build Egypt’s new democracy.
results.creator_credit_for_label: The Othrs, Roast Beef Productions, Worldview Entertainment, Noujaim Films, Jehane Noujaim, Maxyne Franklin and Karim Amer
results.headline_credit_for_label: Egypt, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2013
results.description: The Square looks at the hard realities faced day-to-day by people working to build Egypt’s new democracy. Cairo’s Tahrir Square is the heart and soul of the film, which follows several young activists. Armed with values, determination, music, humor, an abundance of social media, and sheer obstinacy, they know that the thorny path to democracy only began with Hosni Mubarek’s fall. The life-and-death struggle between the people and the power of the state is still playing out.

results.title: The Spy Who Came in from the Cold
results.creator_credit: Paramount, Salem Films Limited, Martin Ritt, Hal Pereira, Paul Dehn, Guy Trosper and Tambi Larsen
results.brief_description: British agent Alec Leamas refuses to come in from the Cold War during the 1960s, choosing to face another mission, which may prove to be his final one.

constellations_other.name: My People
constellations_other.description: The breakout single for Sydney dance duo The Presets, 'My People' was one of the biggest hits of 2007 and propelled by the engaging music video.

results.title: The Sound of Music
results.brief_description: In the years before the Second World War, a tomboyish postulant at an Austrian abbey becomes a governess in the home of a widowed naval captain with seven children, and brings a new love of life and music into the home.

results.title: The Social Dilemma
results.creator_credit: Adam Wheatley, Vickie Curtis, Larissa Rhodes, Davis Coombe, Jeff Orlowski, The Space Program, Argent Pictures and Exposure Labs
results.brief_description: This documentary-drama hybrid explores the dangerous human impact of social networking, with tech experts sounding the alarm on their own creations.

constellations_other.name: Fake news: too little too late
constellations_other.description: Unbound Creations’ Headliner: NoviNews explores the impact of the media and fake news on society, something that is fast becoming one of the biggest concerns of our age.

results.title: The Snow Queen
results.brief_description: When the Snow Queen, a lonely and powerful fairy, kidnaps the human boy Kay, his best friend Gerda must overcome many obstacles on her journey to rescue him.

constellations_other.name: Drawing on influences
constellations_other.description: Waves of animators have been inspired by the style of previous animators to help tell their own stories.

results.description: When the Snow Queen, a lonely and powerful fairy, kidnaps the human boy Kay, his best friend Gerda must overcome many obstacles on her journey to rescue him.
description_for_label: When the Snow Queen, a lonely and powerful fairy, kidnaps the human boy Kay, his best friend Gerda must overcome many obstacles on her journey to rescue him.

results.title: The Slap
results.creator_credit: Penny Chapman, Tony Ayres, Helen Bowden, Michael McMahon and Matchbox Pictures
results.brief_description: The Slap is an Australian television drama series based on the multi-award-winning novel by Australian author Christos Tsiolkas, which explores what happens when a man slaps a child, who is not related to him, at a suburban barbecue.

constellations_other.name: Ana Kokkinos
constellations_other.description: The films and TV works of Ana Kokkinos often explore the experiences of second-generation Australians, queer identities and class. Since beginning her career in the early 90s, those stories have started to appear more frequently on Australian screens.

constellations_other.name: Tony Ayres
constellations_other.description: Charts the acclaimed career of Tony Ayres through his work in film and TV.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Penny Chapman, Tony Ayres, Helen Bowden, Michael McMahon and Matchbox Pictures
results.description: When a man slaps a 4-year-old boy, the incident results in an intense court case.
description_for_label: When a man slaps a 4-year-old boy, the incident results in an intense court case.

results.title: The Simpsons
results.brief_description: Set in Springfield, the average American town, the show focuses on the antics and everyday adventures of the Simpson family; Homer, Marge, Bart, Lisa and Maggie, as well as a virtual cast of thousands. Since the beginning, the series has been a pop culture icon, attracting hundreds of celebrities to guest star. The show has also made name for itself in its fearless satirical take on politics, media and American life in general.

constellations_other.name: Cartoon classics and criticism
constellations_other.description: A whole cavalcade of cartoons have successfully made the leap into arcades and onto consoles, but the relationship between cinema and videogames is far more likely to fizzle out.

constellations_other.name: Oh, no! Beta!
constellations_other.description: The Sony Betacam BVP-3P was a broadcast-quality camera that used Sony's Beta system, most commonly found in consumer cameras. During the Format Wars in the 1970s and 80s, Beta lost to the cheaper and more accessible Video Home System (VHS).

constellations_other.name: Transformations
constellations_other.description: Like many techniques born from the visual language of magic lanterns, the dissolve effect was incorporated into filmmaking and is still used today.

constellations_other.name: Nadia Tass
constellations_other.description: Comedic and cult classics take centre stage in Nadia Tass' career.

results.description: The Simpsons focuses on the antics and everyday adventures of a typical American family and the town of Springfield. A pop culture icon since its inception, The Simpsons is known for its fearless satirical takes on politics, media and American life.
description_for_label: The Simpsons focuses on the antics and everyday adventures of a typical American family and the town of Springfield. A pop culture icon since its inception, The Simpsons is known for its fearless satirical takes on politics, media and American life.

results.title: The Silence of the Lambs
results.brief_description: Jonathan Demme’s adaptation of Thomas Harris’ Silence of the Lambs set the standard for modern serial killer movies. Stellar performances and iconic characters helped it take out five Academy Awards and has been described as the Psycho of the 90s.

constellations_other.name: Splicing history and silencing the lambs
constellations_other.description: With plastic strips coated with light-sensitive emulsions, film strips captured light and created moving pictures. In this Constellation we trace celluloid and splicing as plot device to serial killers, secrets agents and Super 8.

results.description: Clarice Starling is a top student at the FBI’s training academy. Jack Crawford wants Clarice to interview Dr. Hannibal Lecter, a brilliant psychiatrist who is also a violent psychopath, serving life behind bars for various acts of murder and cannibalism. Crawford believes that Lecter may have insight into a case and that Starling, as an attractive young woman, may be just the bait to draw him out.
